channel.title: NPC Spawning Error?
channel.description:
I'm trying to spawn some NPC's with a PI base and this is what happens.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "945 3095 3108 0 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1532) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:39) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.[/code]
This is the NPC I am trying to spawn: [code]// npc spawnX spawnY height walk/face spawn = 945 3095 3108 0 2[/code]
This is a NPC that already works being spawned: [code]spawn = 81 2924 3281 0 1[/code]
Any help would be much appreciated.
-I was looking in the npcsounds.cfg file and noticed there were sounds for the NPC's that I could spawn and nothing for NPC's that can't be spawned right now.
[b]Just realized just by posting here. Viewed NPCHandler and realized that the spaces between the id's were tabs.
No Help needed anymore.[/b]

item.title: NPC Spawning Error?
item.dc:creator: @blkancients blkancients
item.description:
@blkancients wrote:

I’m trying to spawn some NPC’s with a PI base and this is what happens.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "945 3095 3108 0 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1532) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:39) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.

This is the NPC I am trying to spawn:

// npc spawnX spawnY height walk/face spawn = 945 3095 3108 0 2

This is a NPC that already works being spawned:

Any help would be much appreciated.

-I was looking in the npcsounds.cfg file and noticed there were sounds for the NPC’s that I could spawn and nothing for NPC’s that can’t be spawned right now.

[b]Just realized just by posting here. Viewed NPCHandler and realized that the spaces between the id’s were tabs.

No Help needed anymore.[/b]

Read full topic
